title: honor levels
body: So after a game with my friends I got a notification that if i get honored by 2 premades or one random i'd get level 3 honor but after that happened I still don't have it. Any help?

replies.body: yea it was a popup but i got it solved. ty anyway :)

> [{quoted}](name=DatFatRaccoon,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=6gL1Au56,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-30T00:34:55.077+0000)
>
> It's not quite like that, but I can clarify. Once you reach Level 3 Honor, if you're honored by a rando' or any 2 players you will receive a flair like a laurel on your loading border. However getting those honors won't bring you up to Level 3 on their own. :(
> 
> You said you got a notification, can you detail that more for me? Was it a pop up that said that, or something in the chat window that looked like a system message? I'm just asking because lately we've been noticing a lot of pranksters abusing a chat function to look like a system notification.
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I got one of those explanations at the start of the game, dw, if read carefully it says logically that once u reach lvl3......but if ur reading casually it makes u think u r close to getting lvl3 (like this person thought)....Wording could be better but it not a huge prob
